tooltip.lightningmod.frequency:
The chance of a lightning strike during a thunderstorm.
A LOWER number means MORE frequent lightning. Vanilla: 100,000.
tooltip.lightningmod.skeleton_horse_chan:
Multiplier for the chance of a lightning strike spawning a skeleton horse trap.
1.0 = Vanilla (100%), 0.5 = Half chance (50%), 0.0 = Disabled.
tooltip.lightningmod.all_biomes:
If enabled, lightning can strike in dry biomes
(deserts, savannas, etc.) during a thunderstorm.
